channel.title: performance_schema on Hack MySQL
channel.description: Recent content in performance_schema on Hack MySQL

item.title: Mining the MySQL Performance Schema for Transactions
item.description: The MySQL Performance Schema is a gold mine of valuable data. Among the many nuggets you can extract from it is an historical report of transactions: how long a transaction took to execute, what queries were executed in it (with query metrics), and idle time between queries. Mining this information is not trivial, but it’s fun and this blog post shows how to start.

item.title: MySQL Transaction Reporting
item.description: How to inspect and report MySQL transactions using the Performance Schema
